Dialogue.Page: Mod: OW Ventures Scavenger Hunt Authors: coderCleric
Scavenger Hunt is a mod made for the first Outer Wilds Mod Jam which puts the player through a series of scavenger hunts to train them properly for the OW Ventures Space Program.
The end goal of the scavenger hunt is to find what's inside the vault, which the scavenger hunt itself leaves the breadcrumbs for.
While it didn't win any awards, it is an experience worth trying!
